meaning: She can be reached purely through inner vision and inner practices (antar yāga or antar yoga).
commentary: Raja yoga and Kriya yoga are inner yoga (antar yāga). Surya namaskara and other physical yogas are external yogas that are used for perfecting the inner yoga.  One second of inner contemplation is far more superior to hours of external worship. She can be easily reached through such inner worship/ yoga.
